tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  AMAZING LECTURES  CARING
comments: This professor is one of the best Ive had at Southern. Shes funny & brings that humor to her lectures. Reading quizzes get you ready for the lecture to come. Tests are straightforward & she gives you a review. Attendance is part of your grade so dont skip class. She makes A&P fun & easy to understand using real world examples. Students love her!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  CARING  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Absolutely amazing! Love this woman! She is the best teacher I\'ve had at southern. She makes the material very clear and gives examples to help you absorb it. Very helpful when things got confusing! Would definitely take her again.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Professor Harrison is the best professor that I have ever had. She\'s a very nice lady who loves what she does. Her knowledge on the human body is remarkable. She will answer questions Physical Therapists are clueless about. Your opportunity to get an A is there if you pay attention and do the work. If your a slacker then your grade will reflect it.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Professor Harrison is absolutely phenomenal. She is very knowledgeable and passionate about what she is teaching. For someone who is not particularly academically strong, I was able to receive an A+ in her class. She is very clear on her expectations and provides as much support as you need. I\'d recommend her class to anyone.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: WOW the most helpful, amazing, and interesting class ever I took in the EXS department at scsu. she made it clear that you will pass if you do the work. she is easy going, funny, smart. mostly powerpoint presentations, her test very straight forward and she loves chocolate

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Prof. Harrison\'s A&P1 class consisted almost entirely of power point. She made sure you had all the info you needed and would hint to you what would be on the test. All the quizes were online and had a time limit, but it was still easy to look through your notes for the answers. She was willing to help if you needed it.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Do not take this course expecting to goof off. Brenda is serious about what she does, and you ARE going to exercise. We ran the track and worked out in the weight room (which she helps you create a program for). Brenda is very easy-going, but do not screw around, or you will fail.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Prof. Harrison is a great professor! If you come to class with a fun attitude and actually try you will get a great grade. Even if you hate excercise and you come in and show effort Brenda will give you a good grade! There is little book work labs due every week. Its basically only a small worksheet. TAKE THIS CLASS!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: best class ever all we did was ball everday cause we choose the team building option!!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She is a very good teacher. All you have to do is run or walk depending on the program you are chosen for. You keep weekly logs of the exercise you do in and out of class, and that\'s it. I enjoyed this class, but do not take it if you are lazy, because you wont be motivated to do anything.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: professor harrison is the sweetest lady you\'ll ever meet. what we did in class depended on our "fitness goals" for the semester. i chose to do a mile time. there\'s sprints or run/walk program or you can go in the weight room for the whole class. fitness logs are due every week in which you have to record the exercise that you do every day.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Fun class w/great prof - very nice. She asks for your input on how the class will be set up. Not sure what other person means by it being a "high school gym class" as our class as a whole decided the format during the 1st week of school. Class was fun but you DO exercise. No books or homework. You do need to go to class otherwise you fail.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Awesome Prof! Class was fun but attendance is mandatory - your grade comes from your attendance & participation. Class is an activity class. No homework/papers to do. She even starts class 5 mins late so that if you are on the other side of campus you can make it to class. Be prepared though - she usually goes right up until class time ends.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Class was nothing like described in the first day of class. She treated it like a high school gym class instead of teaching us real exercise things. Consistently started the class late and ended too late to make it to next classes. An overall pointless class that I shouldn\'t have wasted my time taking.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Awesome class. Brenda is a lovely professor. I was a fat slob when the class started then she helped me loose 50 lbs. I am so thankful for that I owe her my life.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Great professor. As long as you show up and participate you\'ll do fine. Attendance is extremely important though because it\'s an activity course. Fun class. 2 half-credit sections are required to graduate. Take them both with her back to back (8 weeks each)
